description: Somehow through DB manipulations or something, a compute_node entry can point to a non-compute service_id.  We should sanity check this when scheduling.
title: scheduler host_manager should sanity check compute_node entries

comments.content: Somehow through DB manipulations or something, a compute_node entry can point to a non-compute service_id.  We should sanity check this when scheduling.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cbehrens

comments.content: This really isn't a bug, it's not enough to move forward on. Happy to reopen with a larger description of what's the thing we should fix.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague
